content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (0, 6), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "初動。敵は(26,26)近傍と推定。自艦(0,6)の東側に陸地帯があるため、まず南へ回り込んで外洋に出る。ASQ1を中央寄り(16,16)へ索敵発艦し、道中での発見を狙う。ASQ2は温存し、接触後の即時攻撃/別扇形索敵に回す。先に発見して主導権を取る方針。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 1, "y": 8}, "launch_target": {"x": 16, "y": 16}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (16, 16) while at (2, 8).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (1, 8), en route to target (1, 8), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (2, 8), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母は(26,26)近傍と推定。こちらは島嶼線の西側を南下して安全を確保しつつ索敵半径を拡張。ASQ1は中央(16,16)へ、ASQ2をやや深め(19,19)へ投射して扇形に広域索敵、往路での発見→即時攻撃を狙う。空母は南へ機動して次波の射程を確保。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 3, "y": 12}, "launch_target": {"x": 19, "y": 19}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=19 y=19 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=18 y=18.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "修正：ASQ2の目標が射程超過だったため(18,18)へ調整し、ASQ1(16,16)との扇形索敵を維持。空母は南東へ機動して次波の射程と索敵線を拡張。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 3, "y": 12}, "launch_target": {"x": 18, "y": 18}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (18, 18) while at (3, 10).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (2, 10), en route to target (3, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (5, 9), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (3, 10), outbound toward (18, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両索敵隊は中央～中央南(16,16)(18,18)へ進出中。敵は(26,26)近傍想定。空母は南東へ前進し、帰投時の再発艦位置を前に出して探索・攻撃半径を拡大。ただし中～南部の島嶼帯を回避するため左寄りルートで(5,14)方面へ。次ターン以降、接触報告の方向から敵位置を推定して機動修正する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 5, "y": 14}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 12), en route to target (5, 14), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (8, 11), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (7, 10), outbound toward (18, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1(→16,16)・ASQ2(→18,18)で中央～中央南を扇形索敵中。敵は(26,26)近傍想定。この第一波で未発見の可能性が高いので、次波でより深い(22～24, 22～26)付近に届くよう空母を南東の外洋へ前進。島嶼帯を回避しつつ帰投受け入れと再発艦位置を前進させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 7, "y": 16}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 14) while at (11, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 16) while at (11, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 14) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (9, 16) while at (9, 13).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (10, 14) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (9, 16) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 14), en route to target (7, 16), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (11, 13), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (9, 13), outbound toward (18, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機2隊(BSQ1:10,14／BSQ2:9,16)を確認。方位から敵空母は南東～東南（概ね(22～27,22～27)）にいる可能性大。こちらの第一波は(16,16)(18,18)方面で接触を狙う。被索敵・被雷撃回避のため空母は西南へジグザグ回避して敵機の探索線を外す。帰投受け入れ可能距離は維持。次波は敵機の帰還方位から空母位置を確定して深追い索敵・攻撃へ。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 12}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (8, 15) while at (12, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 12) while at (13, 14).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (7, 15) while at (11, 13).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (6, 14) while at (2, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 10) while at (12, 15).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (10, 10) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (6, 14) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (2, 13), en route to target (2, 12), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (14, 15), outbound toward (16, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (12, 15), outbound toward (18, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機2隊を至近(6,14/10,10)で捕捉。進行方位から敵空母は南東隅(おおむね22～28,22～28)に存在と推定。こちらは先に見つかると不利なので回避最優先。空母は南西へ大きく退避して敵の探索線を外す。第一波(→16,16/→18,18)は目標到達・未発見なら帰投へ。帰還報告と敵機の帰還方位から敵空母位置を確定し、次波で深部を叩く。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 16}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (11, 13) while at (15, 16).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (2, 14) while at (1, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (16, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (11, 13) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (2, 14) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (1, 15), en route to target (0, 16), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (16, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (15, 17), outbound toward (18, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵機2隊を至近で捕捉。進路は西方で、敵空母は南東隅方面と推定。こちらの露見リスクが高いので先に空母を南西へ離脱し探索線から外す。ASQ1は帰投中、ASQ2は(18,18)到達後に未発見なら帰還見込み。敵機の帰還方位から空母位置を絞り、敵波通過後に南東へ大移動して第二波発艦で決める。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 18}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(BSQ2) while at (1, 15).
- your carrier(AC1) hit an enemy squadron(BSQ2) causing 24 damage while at (1, 15).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (9, 21) while at (12, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (10, 18) while at (12, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (18, 18).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (9, 21) (previously at (9, 21)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (10, 18) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (2, 14) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 20/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (1, 15), en route to target (0, 18), HP 76/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (18, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母を(9,21)で初認。こちらは被雷後でHP76。まず至近の敵機群の帰還通路を外しつつ、早期リカバリー→即時反撃の体制へ。空母は南西へ滑って秘匿を維持しながらASQ1の帰投を受け、着艦次第BC1座標(9,21)へ第一撃、ASQ2は続波として追撃予定。敵の新波が来る前に先制打撃で主導権を奪う。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 2, "y": 17}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (9, 20) while at (10, 16).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (5, 16) while at (2, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (10, 20) while at (8, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (5, 16) while at (8, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (10, 20) while at (14, 18).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (10, 20) (previously at (9, 21)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (5, 16) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 20/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (8, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (14, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母を(10,20)で確実に捕捉。こちら2隊は帰投中で発艦不可。まず空母は位置を維持して最速で両隊を着艦・再武装、ASQ1を即時(敵の進路予測に合わせて10,20周辺)へ第一次攻撃、ASQ2を続波で追撃する。敵機は復路と見られるため至近でも被雷の恐れは低い。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (6, 18) while at (2, 17).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (9, 20) while at (6, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (7, 19) while at (4, 16).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(BC1) at (8, 19) while at (10, 18).

- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (7, 19) (previously at (9, 17)), HP 20/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron ASQ1: position (4, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "敵空母を(8,19)で確実捕捉中。こちら2隊は帰投中で今ターンは発艦不可。最優先は最短で回収・即時再武装→先制一撃。空母は位置維持で回収を最速化。次ターン、ASQ1を(8,19)～(9,20)帯へ直撃、ASQ2を(10,20)やや先行位置へ重ねて逃げ道を塞ぐ。敵新波発進前に叩く。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "敵空母BC1を(8,19)で継続捕捉中。ASQ1は母艦で即発艦可能、ASQ2は(6,18)から帰投中（復路は攻撃不可）。今が先手の好機。母艦は回収優先で定位置維持、ASQ1をBC1の直近進路(10,20)へ指示し、往路で捕捉次第攻撃させる。ASQ2は着艦次第、BC1の逃走方向に第二撃を準備する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 20}}}

{"thinking": "敵空母BC1を(8,19)で継続捕捉。今が叩きどころ。ASQ1は(10,20)へ、ASQ2を直に(8,19)へ指示して挟撃し、往路接触で攻撃させる。一方で至近(2,18)の敵機を回避するため、空母は南西へ退避して探索線から外す。攻撃後の敵の退避方向に合わせて次の再攻撃を準備。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 19}, "launch_target": {"x": 8, "y": 19}}}

{"thinking": "BC1を(8,19)で確実捕捉。ASQ1/ASQ2は往路で接触次第攻撃に移るため、このターンは母艦の被攻撃回避と秘匿を優先して西端へ退避継続。至近の敵機(BSQ1/BSQ2)は復路と見られ脅威低。撃破後は帰投を受けて追撃or再攻撃を準備。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 19}, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "ASQ1がBC1(8,19)に接敵中、ASQ2も同座標へ向け往路で攻撃可。いまは空母の秘匿と被雷回避を優先しつつ、西縁沿いに南下して敵帰還機の探索線を外す。撃破後は両隊帰投を受けて追撃準備。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 21}, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "BC1を(8,19)で継続捕捉。ASQ2が攻撃中、ASQ1は帰投中。至近(1,20)の敵機を外すため空母はさらに南下して秘匿・回避を優先。次ターン以降、両隊を回収・再武装してBC1へ追撃する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 0, "y": 23}, "launch_target": null}}
